attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2006-0158

Date: 2006-03-23

Sur recommandation du ministre des Affaires étrangères, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil autorise le ministre des Affaires étrangères à approuver, au nom du gouvernement du Canada, les Amendements au Statut de la Conférence de La Haye de droit international privé, faits à La Haye le 30 juin 2005.


Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Foreign Affairs, hereby authorizes the Minister of Foreign Affairs to approve, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the amendments to the Statute of the Hague Conference on Private International Law, done at The Hague on June 30, 2005.

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Foreign Affairs, hereby authorizes the Minister of Foreign Affairs to approve, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the amendments to the Statute of the Hague Conference on Private International Law, done at The Hague on June 30, 2005.
